SELECT frequently_idx, fq_question, admin_id, reg_date, rnum FROM (SELECT frequently_idx, fq_question, admin_id, reg_date, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY frequently_idx ASC) AS rnum FROM frequently_question) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM question

SELECT question_idx, q_category_name, subject, member_id, reg_date, state, rnum FROM ( SELECT q.question_idx, qc.q_category_name, q.subject, q.member_id, q.reg_date, q.state, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY q.question_idx DESC) AS rnum FROM question q, question_category qc WHERE q.question_category=qc.q_category_idx AND q.isdelete = 1 ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE question SET answer=#{answer}, admin_id=#{admin_id}, state=1, answer_date=to_date(#{answer_date},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') WHERE question_idx=#{question_idx}
